# pexpec

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

Partial expectation of a random variable $X$ over $\mathcal{A} \in \mathbb{R}$ is:

$$
\mathbb{E}(X \ \mathbb{I}\{X \in \mathcal{A}\})
$$The package provide computations of partial expectations for the following parametric models:

-   Normal

-   Log-Normal

-   Gamma

-   Weibull

-   Exponential

-   Uniform

-   Beta

-   Gumbel

-   Pareto

-   Rayleigh

-   Binomial

-   Negative Binomial

-   Geometric

-   Hypergeometric

-   Poisson
